_metadata.description: Browser Automation Studio requirement registry (modular) - Parent-level requirements reference child modules declared under imports

requirements.prd_ref: Functional Requirements > Must Have > Visual workflow builder
requirements.title: Persist visual workflows with nodes/edges and folder hierarchy
requirements.description: Tracks the complete experience for creating and managing projects and workflows. Child implementation requirements cover dialog affordances, validation, and persistence.

requirements.prd_ref: Functional Requirements > Must Have > Real-time screenshot display
requirements.title: Stream execution telemetry (screenshots, progress, logs) while runs are active
requirements.description: Aggregates execution runtime behaviours, including websocket telemetry, CLI observability, and automation coverage.

requirements.prd_ref: Functional Requirements > Should Have > Replay & marketing renderer
requirements.title: Persist normalized execution artifacts for replay & video rendering
requirements.description: Ensures replay artifacts are persisted, queryable, and exportable for downstream renderers.

requirements.prd_ref: Functional Requirements > Must Have > AI workflow generation
requirements.title: AI-generated workflows validated against the execution plan
requirements.description: Validates that AI prompts produce executable workflows with deterministic smoke coverage.

requirements.title: Conflict-aware autosave with auditable version history
requirements.description: Captures autosave behaviour, version history presentation, and restore flows across UI and API.

outputs.description: Machine-readable coverage report for CI dashboards

artifacts.description: Live phase summaries written by test/phases via testing::phase::end_with_summary

aggregates.formula: count of requirements with status != complete and criticality in [P0, P1]
